list_definition.definition: a piece of electrical equipment used for shaving

list_ex_of_english: In a split thickness skin graft, a shaver is used to shave a layer of skin from the abdomen or thigh.
The shave brush is utilized most often today by wet shavers in tandem with a double-edged safety razor or a straight razor.
He then pals around with an electric shaver, which eventually saves him from a hungry cat.
An unconvicted prisoner may in future apply to have a battery shaver.
This was a mechanical version of the dry shaver that was operated by repeatedly squeezing a lever on the handle.
The brush is then transferred either to a separate bowl or to the shaver's face to be lathered.

At 3 cm from a gentleman's electric shaver, it falls between 15 and 15,000 microteslas.
